channel.title: Aglilty Skill
channel.description:
Howdy,
Now correct me if i am wrong but would it be extreamly easy to creat a script to autorun the Nome Stronghold Agility Course, Wouldnt it be simple color replacement and a few move here and click here commands? :confused:
If anyone has a old script for agility laying around that does or does not work please post here so i can study them :)
Ok ok i have now found a agility trainer for the stronghold but it seems no to work maybe you guys wanna take a look at it, the scripting seems fine and i can not debug it at all,
TYVM, Blackhat :P[br][size=1]Posted at: April 01, 2006, 07:48:13 pm[/size][hr]Ok,
I now have a new one, That compiles fine, And starts to work!!!
But then makes RS freeze...
And when i stop SCAR, RS starts up again ??
Any ideas? ill post this new Working Agility trainer here to.
Cheers, Blackhat[br][size=1]Posted at: April 01, 2006, 11:44:17 pm[/size][hr]o.k
here i found a fully working 100% gnome agility trainer special thanks to GenoDemon (I have nothing to do with this). It is free but you can not sell it ever! acording to GenoDemons terms, so respect them. :)
Gnome Agility v 1.3 By: GenoDemoN NO-AntiRandoms, not really needed though Start At Log Have Compass near north v-Bright Have Run on DO NOT WEAR ANYTHING GREY!!!!!!!! gets 4.8-5.5k exp an hour if ur lucky
Make sure you set the color of MUD or you will just Spin outa control after the pipes!! this script is called (gnomeagilitycourse.scar) the rest are crapy compared to this! -Worked For: 4 Minutes and 17 Seconds --Cycles: 3 ---Exp: 282 ----Exp a hour: 3567
Have Phun and get faster!
Kind Regards, Blackhat[br][size=1]Posted at: April 02, 2006, 01:46:02 am[/size][hr] :mad: :( :mad: I LIE! it does need randoms, i was ripped to shreds by Dr Jeckle at the tiperope. ROLF

Gnome Agility v 1.3
By: GenoDemoN
NO-AntiRandoms, not really needed though
Start At Log
Have Compass near north
v-Bright
Have Run on
DO NOT WEAR ANYTHING GREY!!!
gets 4.8-5.5k exp an hour if ur lucky

Make sure you set the color of MUD or you will just Spin outa control after the pipes!!
this script is called (gnomeagilitycourse.scar) the rest are crapy compared to this!
